cards.content:
Try reinstalling the theme and Winterboard/ Anemone.

Check for updates.

If you use Anemone, do not enable "WB Patch".

If you use Winterboard enable "WB Patch" above all other themes or try Anemone if you still run into issues.

Follow this tutorial for Activator to be themed.

Enable BOTH cjGlyphs and Glyphs.

Put cjGlyphs above Glyphs.
